title: Changing the font in immunity debugger?
content: Does anyone know how to change the font size in immunity debugger? The font option under Options -> Appearance -> Font doesn't seem to change anything and just resets whenever you restart the program.

answers_data.content:
Trying to figure out the problem I came with the following solution: Open Immunity Debugger as an Administrator Go to 
Options >> Appearance >> Fonts
Rename one of the fonts to whatever name you'd like Click on 
Change
and set the settings you wish Go to 
Defaults
tab and set the 
Default font
to be the one you edited. Done. Now the configuration stays any time you open Immunity as an Administrator.

I solved it like this:

after loading a program the panes are filled with data
right-click in the top left pane and a menu will appear
from this menu choose appearence --> font(all) --> the font you want (the "OEM fixed font" works for me)
